resources.string: Tom: Hello, my name is Tom. How did you come by my application?
Tom: Very interesting. And what is your name?
Tom: I have been waiting for you,
Tom: You may be wondering how I know you.
Tom: I can read your mind.
Tom: You are thinking about potatoes.
Tom: You should go eat some.
Tom: I would eat some, but alas, I am but a mere application.
Tom: I must leave now, good-bye.
